dict.acceptation: 尤其地；主要地，格外地；显著地；异常地；

sent.orig: Alcohol use with acetaminophen is especially especially bad for the liver.
sent.trans: 酒和醋氨酚同时服用对肝脏的危害特别大。

sent.orig: Emotional outbursts are also possible, especially if you've been feeling especially constrained or stressed.
sent.trans: 感情上的爆发也不无可能，特别是在你感到约束或压力的时候。

sent.orig: In other words, they are especially good at systemising and especially bad at empathising.
sent.trans: 也就是说他们在系统性上很卓越，但在移情上却很糟糕。

sent.orig: Emotional outbursts are also possible, especially if you've been feeling especially stressed.
sent.trans: 今天也很有可能感情爆发，尤其是你感到特别压抑的时候。

sent.orig: Professor Plaut believes the systems will appear especially appeal especially to the next generation of farmers.
sent.trans: 普拉特教授相信这套系统将特别吸引下一代农场主。
